bouncehandler-notify_subject: Subject of notification email sent to wiki administrators on a failed to parse bounce
notification-bouncehandler:
Title message of Echo notification to notify a user of his/her invalid email address. Parameters:
* $1 is the username of the user whose email address was unsubscribed. Can be used for GENDER.
notification-bouncehandler-flyout:
Flyout message of Echo notification to notify the user of his/her invalid email address. Parameters:
* $1 is the unsubscribed email address of the user.
* $2 is the username of the user whose email address was unsubscribed. Can be used for GENDER.
notification-link-text-change-email: Label of the link that points to Special:ConfirmEmail and Special:ChangeEmail wherein the users are asked to again verify their old email address.
notification-header-unsubscribe-bounceha:
Flyout message of Echo notification to notify the user of his/her invalid email address. Parameters:
* $1 can't be used (there is no agent).
* $2 can't be used (there is no agent).
* $3 is the unsubscribed email address of the user.
* $4 is the username of the user whose email address was unsubscribed. Can be used for GENDER.
